name: SEND Home to School Transport
description: Over 700 students transported daily. DBS-checked drivers and passenger assistants provide safe, reliable SEND school transport across Birmingham and Manchester. Council-accredited with wheelchair-accessible 16-seater minibuses.

name: Non-Emergency Patient Transport Service (NEPTS)
description: CQC rated 'Good' patient transport for renal dialysis, discharge, bariatric, and long-distance patients. Trained Ambulance Care Assistants. Same pricing year-round including bank holidays.

name: Fleet Maintenance & Vehicle Repair
description: In-house vehicle maintenance workshop in Birmingham with skilled technicians and state-of-the-art facilities. Comprehensive fleet maintenance for businesses and individual car owners.

name: Wheelchair & Ambulance Vehicle Conversions
description: VOSA-certified vehicle conversions including wheelchair-accessible minibuses, ambulance conversions with infection control, and luxury minibus conversions. Mercedes, VW, Ford, Renault and more.

name: Driver, ACA & PA Training
description: QualSafe-approved training programmes including Driver CPC courses, Ambulance Care Assistant (ACA) training, and Passenger Assistant (PA) certification. In-house training facilities.

name: Private Minibus Hire
description: Modern fleet of 16-seater wheelchair-accessible minibuses available for corporate events, school trips, days out, and group travel with experienced drivers.

name: Executive Minibus Hire
description: Luxury minibus hire with driver for corporate travel, events, race days (Cheltenham, Royal Ascot), and airport transfers from Birmingham.

name: Airport Transfer Service
description: Reliable airport transfer service to and from Birmingham Airport and other UK airports. Executive vehicles with professional drivers.
